languages.text: The first time in combat that an ally becomes the target of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, this ally gains +10 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Когда в первый раз за бой союзник становится целью применения {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g}, он получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: First time in a combat an ally becomes the target of the Psyker's psychic power, this ally gains +10 to Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill until end of combat.
The first time in combat that an ally becomes the target of the psyker's psychic power, this ally gains +10 to Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill until end of combat.

The first time in combat that an ally becomes the target of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, this ally gains +10 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: Когда в первый раз за бой союзник становится целью применения {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g}, он получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text: The first time in combat that an ally becomes the target of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, this ally gains +10 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Когда в первый раз за бой союзник становится целью применения психосилы, он получает +10 к Ближнему Бою и Дальнему Бою до конца боя.
Когда в первый раз за бой союзник становится целью применения психосилы, он получает +10 к Ближнему Бою и Дальнему Бою до конца боя.

languages.text: Wenn ein Verbündeter zum ersten Mal im Kampf zum Ziel der psionischen {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Kraft des Psionikers{/g} wird, erhält dieser Verbündete bis zum Ende des Kampfes +10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}.
languages.original_text: The first time in combat that an ally becomes the target of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, this ally gains +10 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Verbündeter zum ersten Mal im Kampf zum Ziel der psionischen Kraft des Psionikers wird, erhält dieser Verbündete bis zum Ende des Kampfes +10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}.

languages.text: La première fois qu'un allié est la cible du {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} du psyker, cet allié bénéficie de +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: The first time in combat that an ally becomes the target of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, this ally gains +10 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: La première fois qu'un allié est la cible du pouvoir psychique du psyker, cet allié bénéficie de +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 当盟友首次成为灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}目标时，该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}提高10点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: The first time in combat that an ally becomes the target of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, this ally gains +10 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 当盟友首次成为灵能者的灵能能力目标时，该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}提高10点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: La primera vez en combate que un aliado sea objetivo de los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} del psíquico, el aliado gana +10 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: The first time in combat that an ally becomes the target of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, this ally gains +10 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: La primera vez en combate que un aliado sea objetivo de los poderes psíquicos del psíquico, el aliado gana +10 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 戦闘中、味方が初めて異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}のターゲットになったとき、その味方は戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}が+10される。
languages.original_text: The first time in combat that an ally becomes the target of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, this ally gains +10 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中、味方が初めて異能者の超能力のターゲットになったとき、その味方は戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}が+10される。
